status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Install KS and run on device.
2. Navigate to Phone>Sound>Remote streaming
3. Press "Start streaming" 

Expected Result:
3.The URL should function and sounds should play.

Actual Result:
3.No sound is played.


Not a regression since not working since 3.1.3.GA and 3.2.0.GA
fields.summary: Kitchen Sink: Sound-Remote streaming not working due to bad Url
fields.environment:
Appc Studio:3.2.1.201401281409
Sdk:3.2.1.v20140129144052
alloy:1.3.1-beta4	
titanium:3.2.1-beta3
acs:1.0.12
titanium-code-processor:1.1.0
Osx: Maverick 10.9
Xcode:5.0.2
Device:Iphone5c(v7.0.4),Ipod Touch3(v6.1.3),iPad Air(v7.0.4)

comments.body:
Its due to bad URL, 
Issue reproduced on both SDK Version 3.2.2 GA and 3.4.0 GA

CLI version 3.3.0, 
Titanium SDK version 3.4.0 
Titanium SDK version 3.2.2 
iOS SDK: 7.1 
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201407111535

The issue is reproducible with
Mac osx 10.9.5 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.0.201409231834
Titanium SDK, build: 3.4.0.v20140924140915
acs@1.0.16
alloy 1.5.0-rc5
install@0.1.7
npm@1.4.23
sudo@1.0.3
titanium 3.4.0-rc4
titanium-code-processor@1.1.1
Xcode6.0.1 (6A317)
Devices:
iPhone 6 iOS8
iPhone 6+ iOS 8.0.1
ks <guid>28a706e9-4130-4acb-bc76-9494255a9279</guid>

Verified fixed using:

Titanium SDK 3.5.0.v20141222103320
Studio 3.4.1.201410281743 
Xcode 6.1.1

On: 
iPad mini, iOS 8.1
iPhone 6, iOS 8.2b3
iPhone 4S Sim, iOS 8.1
